div.p: The clinical status of the allergy or intolerance.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/allergy-clinical-status defines the following codes:

tr.td: An active record of a risk of a reaction to the identified substance.
An inactivated record of a risk of a reaction to the identified substance.
A reaction to the identified substance has been clinically reassessed by testing or re-exposure and considered to be resolved.
